instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute, Rm B222, 2145 Sheridan Rd, EV CAMPUS

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Mechanics of robotic manipulation, computer representations and algorithms for manipulation planning, applications to industrial automation, parts feeding, grasping, fixturing, assembly.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Problem sets and a final project. There will be no exams.
